text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus croceoluteus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 3 to 8 centimetres (1.2 to 3.1 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus croceoluteus has been found growing on coniferous wood, in Michigan (November), Florida (July), and Idaho (June).
